mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, TOPIC_ID, USER_ID, UPVOTE, DOWNVOTE, TITLE, CONTENT, POST_TIME,VIEWS FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_ID, TOPIC_ID, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_ID.nextval, #{topicId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update board set views=views+1 where board_id=#{boardId}
